body.name: Linenspa 6 Inch Mattress - Firm Feel - Bonnell Spring with Foam Layer - Mattress in a Box - Youth or Kids Bed - Guest Bedroom - Durable and Breathable Support - Affordable - Twin Size
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 48 mins
features: SIMPLE SETUP AND QUICK EXPANSION: Mattress is compressed, rolled, and sent in a box, open your mattress promptly upon receiving it and allow 24 to 72 hours for full expansion; mattress may expand more quickly in a warm room

INNERSPRING AND FOAM MATTRESS: Five inches of heavy gauge tempered steel coils provide a reliable base and consistent mattress support while the quilted fabric cover and deep foam layer ensure comfort

VERSATILE PROFILE: This mattress offers firm support great for back or stomach sleepers and is ideal for a guest bed, bunk beds, trundle beds, as an RV mattress, or as a transition bed for your toddlers and teens
DURABLE AND BREATHABLE SUPPORT: Made with a durable bonnell spring base and topped with comfort foam, this mattress provides reliable support for all stages of life

AFFORDABLE COMFORT: Finding a comfortable and reliable mattress shouldn’t break the bank, that’s why we designed an affordable mattress that is still comfortable to fully furnish every room in your home with a little left over for the fun things
body.description: A traditional innerspring mattress meets everyday value in the Linenspa 6-Inch Bonnell Spring Mattress. A quilted fabric cover and inner foam layer provide comfort and resilience, while heavy gauge steel coils offer lasting support. The combination creates a firm feel, providing support with a bit of bounce. This transition mattress is perfect for bunk beds, trundle beds, or day beds. As an added measure, this versatile low profile mattress is breathable, durable, and affordable enough to have in every room. This convenient bed in a box comes compressed and rolled, ready for easy setup. .

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: DO NOT REMOVE OR WASH . Spot Clean only. To spot clean, Vacuum your mattress, sprinkle some baking soda on it. Use a scrub brush to gently rub the powder into the mattress and leave it for 10 minutes or so. Vacuum the excess powder. Do not wash. Do not use bleach. Do not machine dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for extra guest matress
reviews.reviewText: We got this mattress for our daughters trundle bed for when she has sleepovers. It was a great price and didn't have bad reviews. We have had it for a few months and we are pleased with it. It's not too thick so it fits under on the trundle perfectly and is also comfortable enough for her friends who sleepover. I personally would not purchase it as a mattress that would be slept on daily, but it is good quality for an extra guest mattress that won't be used regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, affordable twin bed
reviews.reviewText: Like the description said, it came in a box. A little heavy but if youre strong, its a breeze. It fits great on a metal bed frame (also from Amazon). This is my second night sleeping on it, no back pains. Its durable as well, theres no spring indents. Its great for back sleepers, but it feels comfortable enough when sleeping on the side. Two adults can sit on here without it indenting. Overall, this is great if youre looking for affordable, ready to use mattress. But if youre really looking for overall comfortability, then I'd suggest looking into a memory foam one. BUT if youre like me and dont care, as long as youre not sleeping on the floor, then this mattress is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just remove the plastic and roll it out... instructions says take 24-48 hours to fully decompress. My photos show it at 24 hours so am hoping another 24 hours will smooth out all the wrinkles and make it look less frumpy. The inner springs are definitely plastic, you can hear scrunchy plastic noises when sitting or laying on it and can slightly feel the springs so if you suffer from princess-and-the-pea syndrome it will definitely need an additional foam topper for best comfort. But then maybe that is also something another 24 hours will resolve.As it is I purchased it for a daybed in our spare room hoping it wouldn't be too soft for sitting on and comfortable enough for occasional use by my daughter and granddaughter when they visit. It seems firm enough to handle the sitting, time will tell on the sleeping.I will try to post an update if everything improves ... otherwise, for now, It'll Do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the money.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter who has upgraded to a big girl bed. It's actually really comfortable. To the point if she's having a hard time falling asleep I can lay down with her and even I'm comfortable on it. Surprised it does not cost more for how good it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my toddler and where kids are supposed to have harder mattresses, it works for her. However when I have to lay on it, it feels no better than laying on the floor. It's awful. It never fully regained the proper shape (it's been 4 months), the edges of the mattress are still smooshed. Definitely would not recommend for anyone other than a very small child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm and comfortable mattress
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mattress for my granddaughter. She loves it, her sleeping patterns have changed as she takes longer naps. Since we got this mattress. It seems to be durable but I would wait and see. But for now it’s better than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was just fine for me, pretty stiff and my neck hurt a lot, but tbh that could’ve just been me. It served its purpose and was a decent mattress. Comfortable during the summer for sure since it stayed cool pretty well. I’d probably buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like this mattress
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this Gelsea cooling memory foam mattress for my little brother. Unboxed it and it took 4 hrs to fully rebound. He loves 😍 this more than the mattress I got him from Ashley's home store furniture. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a high-quality and affordable piece of mattress!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mattress, great price, happy customer :)
reviews.reviewText: This is quite a good mattress for this price. We had been using foam mattresses for my sons bunk bed but you could feel the metal bars through them, so when this came up for 79.00, there was no question we had to try it. It is fantastic! Great support, pretty comfortable even for adults. It isn't fancy but it isn't awful either. My daughter has a spring mattresses which is terrible compared to this. Great buy! Conveniently packaged, I would purchase this again and recommend this mattress for sure!
No absorbe líquidos fácil de limpiar cómodo no está duro está fresco y de rigides medio

i got this in a box and once i opened it up it blow up to full size. LOL it was one of the coolest things i have seen. This little package just became this so soft and comfortable kids bed. Love it and my daughter loves it. Great product for sure. Would buy again
Firm enough but wanted more thickness.

Es de excelente calidad. No obstante que se considera una colchoneta lo uso como colchón normal. La consistencia firme de los resortes es de gran comodidad para mi gusto. Además de todo es reversible, por lo que recomiendo que se voltee cada 15 días. Lo único es que a mi solo se me expandió 14 centímetros después de salir de su caja.
